mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM major m,universitymajor um WHERE m.majorid=um.majorid AND um.universityid=#{universityid} ORDER BY m.majorid ASC

SELECT e.*, ep.koreanextrarate,ep.mathbtypeextrarate,ep.socialresearchextrarate,ep.scienceresearchextrarate, rrp.koreanreflectionrate,rrp.mathbtypereflectionrate,rrp.mathatypereflectionrate,rrp.englishreflectionrate, rrp.socialReflectionRate,rrp.scienceReflectionRate,rrp.selectcombination,rrp.researchsubjectnum, sat.standardscorecutline,sat.totalpercentile,sat.satscoreuseindex,sat.convertscoremax,sat.convertstandardscorecutline, rr.satreflectionrate,rr.modelSum,rr.schoolreportreflectionrate,rr.practicereflectionrate,rr.interviewreflectionrate, rr.essayreflectionrate,rr.aptitudereflectionrate,rr.etcreflectionrate,rr.etccontent FROM EntranceInfo e,ReflectionRate rr,ExtraPoint ep,ReflectionRatePerSATArea rrp,SATScore sat WHERE sat.majorid=e.majorid AND sat.universityid=e.universityid AND sat.entranceyear=e.entranceyear AND sat.recruitseparate=e.recruitseparate AND rrp.satreflectionrateid=e.satreflectionrateid AND ep.extrapointid=e.extrapointid AND rr.reflectionrateid=e.reflectionrateid AND e.majorid=#{majorId} AND e.universityid=#{universityId} AND sat.recruitSeparate=#{recruitSeparate}

SELECT DISTINCT m.mockid,m.memberid,m.languagetype,m.languageoriginalscore,m.languagestandardscore,m.languagepercentile, m.mathtype,m.mathoriginalscore,m.mathstandardscore,m.mathpercentile,m.englishoriginalscore,m.englishstandardscore,m.englishpercentile, m.languageid,sls.secondlanguageoriginalscore,sls.secondlanguagestandardscore,sls.secondlanguagepercentile,f.*, khs.koreahistoryid,khs.koreahistoryoriginalscore,khs.koreahistorystandardscore ,khs.koreahistorypercentile FROM mocktest m,secondlanguagescore sls,secondlanguage sl, (SELECT a.researchsubjectid AS researchSubjectid1, a.researchsubjectoriginalscore AS researchsubjectoriginalscore1, a.researchsubjectstandardscore AS researchsubjectstandardscore1 ,a.researchsubjectpercentile AS researchsubjectpercentile1, b.researchsubjectid AS researchSubjectid2, b.researchsubjectoriginalscore AS researchSubjectOriginalScore2, b.researchsubjectstandardscore AS researchSubjectStandardScore2,b.researchsubjectpercentile AS researchSubjectPercentile2 FROM researchSubjectScore a, researchSubjectScore b WHERE a.memberid = b.memberid AND a.mockid = b.mockid AND a.mockid = (SELECT MAX(mockid) FROM mocktest WHERE memberid=#{studentId}) AND a.researchsubjectid != 'Hangooksa' AND b.researchsubjectid != 'Hangooksa' AND a.researchsubjectid < b.researchsubjectid AND a.memberid=#{studentId}) f,(SELECT mockid,memberid,researchsubjectid AS koreahistoryid,researchsubjectoriginalscore AS koreahistoryoriginalscore, researchsubjectstandardscore AS koreahistorystandardscore, researchsubjectpercentile AS koreahistorypercentile FROM researchsubjectscore WHERE mockid=(SELECT MAX(mockid) FROM mocktest WHERE memberid=#{studentId}) AND memberid=#{studentId} AND researchsubjectid='Hangooksa') khs WHERE m.languageid=sl.languageid(+) AND sls.mockid(+)=m.mockid AND sls.memberid(+)=m.memberid AND khs.mockid(+)=m.mockid AND khs.memberid(+)=m.memberid AND m.memberid=#{studentId} AND m.mockid=(SELECT MAX(mockid) FROM mocktest WHERE memberid=#{studentId}) ORDER BY m.mockid DESC
